desiredNumberOfDomainControllers.description: The number of domain controllers desired in the replicated directory. Minimum value of `2`.

directoryId.description: The identifier of the directory to which you want to add Region replication.

regionName.description: The name of the Region where you want to add domain controllers for replication.

tags.description: Map of tags to assign to this resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

vpcSettings.description: VPC information in the replicated Region. Detailed below.
